Class QueryUtils

java.lang.Object
  de.unihalle.sqlequalizer.QueryUtils

public class QueryUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Class is a useful collection of static functions helping to handle queries

Author:
Robert Hartmann

DFSFirstDifferentNodeValue

public static int DFSFirstDifferentNodeValue(org.gibello.zql.ZExp r1,
                                             org.gibello.zql.ZExp r2)
Executes a DFS stepwise on two trees represented by rootnode r1 and rootnode r2. If the two current nodes differ we check their Values with OperatorComparer() and return the result

Parameters:
r1 - rootnode of tree 1
r2 - rootnode of tree 2
Returns:
1 if r2 is less than r1, -1 the other way around, 0 if both trees are equal

Parameters:

places

public static int places(java.lang.String attribute,
                         QueryHandler q)
If attribute is a numeric value, returns the places after the colon by using tables saved in QueryHandler q Object e.g. 2.34 has two places (34) after the colon

Parameters:
attribute -
q -
Returns:
Number of places after point/colon

removeDuplicates

public static org.gibello.zql.ZExp removeDuplicates(org.gibello.zql.ZExp exp)
After parser Tree is sorted we can find Duplicates of AND and OR nodes easily by investigate the neighbour nodes

Parameters:
exp - rootnode representing a tree
Returns:
duplicate free tree (considering AND and OR)

compareMetaInfos

public static java.lang.String compareMetaInfos(MetaQueryInfo m1,
                                                MetaQueryInfo m2)
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                                java.lang.IllegalAccessException
Compares two MetaInfoQuery Objects coming from two queries. Formulates a String containing every difference from the two queries.

Parameters:
m1 - Metainfo of Query 1
m2 - Metainfo of Query 2
Returns:
All diferences in String
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
java.lang.IllegalAccessException

addImplicitFormulas

public static org.gibello.zql.ZExp addImplicitFormulas(org.gibello.zql.ZExp exp,
                                                       QueryHandler q)
Adds implicit formulas warning! after this function one have to recall the KNF function because its structure will be destroyed in this function.

Returns:
Rootnode of tree with added implicit formulas as stated in master thesis

replaceSubqueries

public static org.gibello.zql.ZExp replaceSubqueries(org.gibello.zql.ZExp exp,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Table> tables)
Replaces Subqueries as Stated in Master Thesis

Parameters:
exp - rootnode representing tree where the subqueries should be replaced
tables - All used Tables under FROM for evaluating if a column can be null
Returns:
Rootnode of tree with replaced subqueries
